## Public Member Functions

### getMaxInstLength() {#a081e0d017dbcb21393b0e55d70d4550c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>unsigned AMDGPUMCAsmInfo::getMaxInstLength (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsubtargetinfo">MCSubtargetInfo</a> &#42; STI) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Returns the maximum possible encoded instruction size in bytes.

If <code>STI</code> is null, this should be the maximum size for any subtarget.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/lib/target/amdgpu/mctargetdesc/amdgpumcasminfo-h/#l00030">30</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/lib/target/amdgpu/mctargetdesc/amdgpumcasminfo-h">AMDGPUMCAsmInfo.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/lib/target/amdgpu/mctargetdesc/amdgpumcasminfo-cpp/#l00054">54</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/lib/target/amdgpu/mctargetdesc/amdgpumcasminfo-cpp">AMDGPUMCAsmInfo.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### shouldOmitSectionDirective() {#adf19d3b66e114232ade937d6a7e9c654}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool AMDGPUMCAsmInfo::shouldOmitSectionDirective (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> SectionName) const</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Return true if the .section directive should be omitted when emitting <code><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sectionname">SectionName</a></code>.

For example:

shouldOmitSectionDirective(&quot;.text&quot;)

returns false =&gt; .section .text,#alloc,#execinstr returns true =&gt; .text

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/lib/target/amdgpu/mctargetdesc/amdgpumcasminfo-h/#l00029">29</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/lib/target/amdgpu/mctargetdesc/amdgpumcasminfo-h">AMDGPUMCAsmInfo.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/lib/target/amdgpu/mctargetdesc/amdgpumcasminfo-cpp/#l00047">47</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/lib/target/amdgpu/mctargetdesc/amdgpumcasminfo-cpp">AMDGPUMCAsmInfo.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
